name: Greater Rending Fury
text: When your claws latch on to an opponent, the effect is bloody and horrific.
prerequisites: Improved Rending Fury, Rending Fury, base attack bonus +12, rend special attack.
benefit: Whenever you rend an opponent, you deal 1d6 bleed damage to that opponent. This is an addition to the effects of the rend.
staminaText: When you rend an opponent, you can spend 2 stamina points to deal 1d6+2 points of bleed damage to your opponent instead of 1d6 points of bleed damage.
text_zh: 你撕开对手时的场面血腥而又恐怖。
prerequisites_zh: 疯狂撕扯，精通疯狂撕扯，BAB+12，＜撕扯＞特殊攻击。
benefit_zh: 当你撕扯一名对手，你对其造成1d6出血伤害。这是在撕扯伤害额外的效果。
staminaText_zh: 当你撕扯一名敌人时，你可以消耗2点耐力来对你的敌人造成1d6+2点流血伤害而不是1d6点流血伤害。
